com.crossover.trial.rest

Class WeatherCollectorEndpointImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.crossover.trial.rest.WeatherCollectorEndpointImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WeatherCollectorEndpoint

    @Path(value="/collect")
public class WeatherCollectorEndpointImpl
extends Object
implements WeatherCollectorEndpoint
    A REST implementation of the WeatherCollector API. Accessible only to airport weather collection sites via secure VPN.
    Author:
    code test administrator

      • updateWeather

        @POST
 @Path(value="/weather/{iata}/{pointType}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateWeather(@PathParam(value="iata")
                                                                                                                                         String iataCode,
                                                                                                                                         @PathParam(value="pointType")
                                                                                                                                         String pointType,
                                                                                                                                         String datapointJson)
        Description copied from interface: WeatherCollectorEndpoint
        Update the airports atmospheric information for a particular pointType with json formatted data point information.
        Specified by:
        updateWeather in interface WeatherCollectorEndpoint
        Parameters:
        iataCode - the 3 letter airport code
        pointType - the point type, emDataPointType for a complete list
        datapointJson - a json dict containing mean, first, second, thrid and count keys
        Returns:
        HTTP Response code

        Add a new airport to the known airport list.
        Specified by:
        addAirport in interface WeatherCollectorEndpoint
        Parameters:
        iata - the 3 letter airport code of the new airport
        latString - the airport's latitude in degrees as a string [-90, 90]
        longString - the airport's longitude in degrees as a string [-180, 180]
        Returns:
        HTTP Response code for the add operation
